jcr:content.jcr:title: Institut national de physique nucléaire et de physique des particules

contentheadline.headline: Institut national de physique nucléaire et de physique des particules

contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} The '''Institut national de physique nucléaire et de physique des particules''', better known as '''IN2P3''', is a division of the [[French National Centre for Scientific Research]] established in 1971. Its purpose is "to promote and unite research activities in the various fields of physics". == External links == * {{Official|http://www.in2p3.fr/index.htm}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Institut National De Physique Nucleaire Et De Physique Des Particules}} [[Category:Research institutes in France]] [[Category:Physics institutes]] [[Category:French National Centre for Scientific Research]] {{France-university-stub}}
